Docs.summary: Supplies current context information to configuration-section handlers in ASP.NET applications.

Docs.summary: Gets the virtual path to the Web.config configuration file.
Docs.value: The virtual path to the Web.config file. when evaluating Machine.config; an empty string ("") when evaluating the root Web.config file for the site.
Docs.returns: The virtual path to the Web.config file. when evaluating Machine.config; an empty string ("") when evaluating the root Web.config file for the site.
